quote: You have the right to perform your duty, but not to the fruits of your actions.
Those who see all beings in the Self, and the Self in all beings, never turn away from it.
What we think, we become. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts, we make the world.
The soul is not born, nor does it die; it was not produced from anyone, nor was any produced from it.
When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a lamp in a windless place.
